main event: Lights in the sky and illuminated clouds were observed in layers and varying shades of red and yellow.
interesting points: The sighting occurred over a span of 3 hours,The observation was made at 2038 on 6 November 1957,The clouds exhibited varying colors, including red and yellow,The document is part of a UFO report from Project Blue Book,The conclusion drawn from the sighting was 'Aurora'.
sighted object: lights in the sky and illuminated clouds
